author: Sam McDowell
comment: I like it - needs improved user interface for use on watch.  I use it while working out, which means quick glances at the screen to see time remaining.  Unfortunately, the small font is difficult to make out in this fashion.  Also, the timer end vibration needs to be longer, so not confused with other notifications.  Thanks, Sam
title: Needs more work

author: Mathew Adamson
comment: Useless when it doesn't buzz with the screen dimmed. 4 star if that was fixed.   **was replied to by wearable software that the problem was fixed and to re-install and review again. The alarm will indeed buzz now when the watch screen is dimmed, the notification is delayed anywhere from 3-4 seconds late to 45 seconds late. Bumped up my review a little as now it has some use for me, would be nice if it was a consistent on time buzz when the timer was up.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: This issue has been fixed. Please install the update and review again. Thanks.

title: Would be great but...

author: Jan Harley
comment: At first use I thought this was great.  It did everything I wanted.  However,  it didn't buzz when the screen was off  so in effect was useless.  Please fix this and I would give five stars. .  However,  no use as it stands.

Third, when you dismiss the card the timer is gone, it's not running in the background.
